title: The Hat Man - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/31/18
itunes:title: The Hat Man - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/31/18
description:
George Noory listens as an open lines caller recounts his experience with a ghostly paranormal entity in his home when he was a teenager.
